title: Virus Link spam
body:
Hello, I just would like to tell everyone about a website (I won't put it up publicly just for safety), its pretty much like other virus spam email, saying for the release of urf  'riot' is giving out free skins and has you tempted to click on it (Iike I have)- it has you sign in, once you have which is where the bad stuff happens, they go into your account and spams everyone on your friends list and sends the same email, repeats itself. And to stop it is just changing your password. I just want to let everyone know about this. 

There is also one thing I would like to know regarding to this topic. A friend of mine has been banned because they were affected by the same virus like I have, because his account was sending the same email to everyone, he was banned for this. I just would like to know whether his account can be unbanned for this under the circumstance that he was a victim.

replies.body: I don't think that you friend would get unbanned, the fact that he clicked on the link is basically risking his account. Rioters have already warned people about not clicking on harmful links but people choose not to listen. It was his own fault and I don't think riot would unban him. It's simple, do not click on ANY links that is not officially permitted by riot. Be careful bro :)
tell your friend to send a support ticket to try and appeal the ban.

No I odn't beleive he will be unbanned. Rioters often comment when they see the scam links and warn about the fact your account could be banned because its up to you to ensure the security of your account
